trans-unit.source: Controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes an enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: Controlos como o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa um membro de enumeração.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapEnumAttribute class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SoapEnumAttribute pertence a uma família de atributos que controla a forma como o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa ou deserializes um objeto como XML de SOAP codificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: O XML resultante está em conformidade com a secção 5 do documento Consortium World Wide Web (www.w3.org) "Simple objeto acesso Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista completa dos atributos semelhantes, consulte [atributos que controlo codificadas SOAP serialização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Para serializar um objeto como uma mensagem SOAP codificado, deve construir a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>utilizar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>criado com o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>método de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Use the SoapEnumAttribute to change the enumeration that the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> generates or recognizes (when it serializes or deserializes a class, respectively).
trans-unit.target: Utilize o SoapEnumAttribute para alterar a enumeração que o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>gera ou reconhece (quando serializa ou deserializes uma classe, respetivamente).</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: For example, if an enumeration contains a member named `One`, but you prefer that the XML output be named `Single`, apply the SoapEnumAttribute to the enumeration member and set the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A> property to "Single".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma enumeração contém um membro com o nome `One`, mas que preferir a saída XML ser com o nome `Single`, aplicar o SoapEnumAttribute para o membro de enumeração e defina o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A>propriedade como "Única".</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A> property value of a SoapEnumAttribute by creating an instance of the SoapEnumAttribute class and assigning it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A>valor da propriedade de um SoapEnumAttribute através da criação de uma instância da classe SoapEnumAttribute e atribui-lo para a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Para serializar um objeto como uma mensagem SOAP codificado, deve construir a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>utilizar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>criado com o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>método de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use the word `SoapEnum` in your code instead of the longer SoapEnumAttribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Pode utilizar a palavra `SoapEnum` no seu código em vez do SoapEnumAttribute mais.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use the SoapEnumAttribute to override an existing enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o SoapEnumAttribute para substituir uma enumeração existente.

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, set its properties and assign the object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A> property of a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Criar um novo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>, definir as respetivas propriedades e atribuir o objeto para a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapEnum%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For each member of the enumeration, you must create a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> and add it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: Para cada membro de enumeração, tem de criar um novo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>e adicione-o a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>Descrição geral de classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use the word `SoapEnum` in your code instead of the longer <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Pode utilizar a palavra `SoapEnum` no seu código em vez de mais <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute"></xref> class using the specified element name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute"> </xref> classe com o nome do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Specify the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A> when you want the generated XML enumerator to differ from the enumerator found in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Especifique o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A>quando quiser que o enumerador XML gerado para diferem do enumerador encontrado na enumeração.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use the word `SoapEnum` in your code instead of the longer <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Pode utilizar a palavra `SoapEnum` no seu código em vez de mais <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The XML element name generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do elemento XML gerado pelo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value generated in an XML document when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes an enumeration, or the value recognized when it deserializes the enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor gerado por um XML documentar quando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa uma enumeração ou valor reconhecido quando deserializes-o membro de enumeração.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Specify the Name when you want the generated XML enumerator to differ from the enumerator found in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Especifique o nome quando pretender que o enumerador XML gerado sejam diferentes do enumerador encontrado na enumeração.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use the word `SoapEnum` instead of the longer <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Pode utilizar a palavra `SoapEnum` em vez de mais <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapEnumAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The value generated in an XML document when the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes the enumeration, or the value recognized when it deserializes the enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: O valor gerado por um XML documentar quando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa a enumeração ou valor reconhecido quando deserializes-o membro de enumeração.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>
